TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Panel extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 代表可作為其他控制項之容器的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that acts as a container for other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是其他控制項的容器。The control is a container for other controls. 當您想要以程式設計方式產生的控制項、 隱藏/顯示的一組控制項，或將當地語系化的一組控制項，它是特別有用。It is especially useful when you want to generate controls programmatically, hide/show a group of controls, or localize a group of controls. 屬性可用於當地語系化来顯示之語言所撰寫由右至左，例如阿拉伯文或希伯來文文字的控制項的內容。The property is useful for localizing a control's content to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic or Hebrew. 控制項提供可讓您自訂的行為和其內容顯示的數個屬性。The control provides several properties that allow you to customize the behavior and display of its contents. 使用屬性來顯示的自訂映像控制項。Use the property to display a custom image for the control. 使用屬性來指定控制項的捲軸。Use the property to specify scroll bars for the control. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將來以程式設計方式產生控制項並將 隱藏/顯示的一組控制項的控制項。The following example illustrates the use of a control to generate controls programmatically and to hide/show a group of controls. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Panel Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Panel Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Panel Web Server Control Overview

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例說明如何建立的新執行個體控制項包含靠右對齊的控制項。The following example illustrates how to create a new instance of the control containing a control that is aligned to the right. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫中的自訂伺服器控制項的方法，讓文字一律會顯示為粗體。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text always displays as bold. summary.span: 取得或設定面板控制項背景影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the background image for the panel control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來顯示的自訂映像控制項。Use this property to display a custom image for the control. 如果影像是小於，它將會並排顯示以填滿。If the image is smaller than the , it will be tiled to fill in the . > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性就只支援瀏覽器支援 HTML 4.0 或更新版本。This property is supported only on browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何以程式設計方式設定屬性。The following example illustrates how to programmatically set the property of the . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Panel.BackImageUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.BackImageUrl Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Panel.BackImageUrl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.BackImageUrl Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中包含之預設按鈕的識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the identifier for the default button that is contained in the control.

value.span: 字串值，對應於 中所包含之按鈕控制項的 。

span.span: A string value corresponding to the for a button control contained in the .

value.span: 預設值是空字串，表示 沒有任何預設按鈕。

span.span: The default is an empty string, indicating that the does not have a default button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，表示取得按的按鈕時控制項有焦點，而且使用者按下 ENTER 鍵。Use the property to indicate which button gets clicked when the control has focus and the user presses the ENTER key. 可以設定的識別項或任何控制可實作除了介面控制項。The can be set to the identifier for a control or any control that implements the interface except a control. 如果設定為控制項未實作介面，或未包含在控制項控制項，控制項會擲回例外狀況，正在轉譯。If the is set to a control that does not implement the interface, or to a control that is not contained in the control, the control throws an exception while rendering. 設定屬性不支援下列案例：Setting the property is not supported for the following scenarios: - 外部輸入控制項的焦點設定在面板中，然後按 ENTER 鍵。Setting focus outside of the input controls in the panel and then pressing the ENTER key. 不保證預設回傳動作觸發程序。The default post back action is not guaranteed to trigger. - 按下 ENTER 鍵，具有多行文字方塊內的焦點。Pressing the ENTER key with focus inside a multi-line textbox. 在多行文字方塊中，按下 ENTER 鍵應該建立新的一行，在文字方塊中這是預期的行為。In a multi-line textbox, pressing the ENTER key should create a new line in the textbox which is the expected behavior. 在瀏覽器中按下 ENTER 鍵，但您的貼文的多行文字方塊中觸發程序內想 ENTER 鍵來建立新的一行，改為您可以附加的 JavaScript 函式的輸入控制項。In browsers where the pressing the ENTER key inside a multi-line textbox triggers a post back but you want the ENTER key to create a new line instead you can attach a JavaScript function to the input control. 指令碼應該擷取 ENTER 鍵，並停止處理回傳。The script should capture the ENTER key and stop the post back. 例如，您可以使用要加入的用戶端指令碼的屬性集合`onKeyPress`事件。For example, you can use the property collection to add client script for the `onKeyPress` event. - 參考是預設按鈕控制項。Referencing a default button that is a control. 只有和支援控制項。Only and controls are supported. - 變更以程式設計方式非同步 post 期間，備份的時機控制項不是內部的控制項。Changing the programmatically during an asynchronous post back when the control is not inside of an control. 可以藉由新增一或多個頁面上啟用非同步回傳至網頁的控制項。Asynchronous post backs can be enabled on a page by adding one or more controls to the page. 若要更新選取的區域，而不是更新整頁回傳與頁面的可用控制項。 controls can be used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)並[網頁局部呈現概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). - 將此屬性由佈景主題或樣式表主題。Setting this property by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection Direction { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection Direction
Public Overridable Property Direction As ContentDirection

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ContentDirection Direction { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ContentDirection get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ContentDirection value); };
member this.Direction : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ContentDirection with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定包含文字之控制項在 控制項中的顯示方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction in which to display controls that include text in a control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定包含在文字之控制項的顯示方向控制項。Use the property to specify the display direction for controls that include text in a control. 此屬性設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未設定內容的方向。The content direction is not set.| |`LeftToRight`|內容的方向為由左至右。The content direction is left to right.| |`RightToLeft`|內容的方向是由右至左。The content direction is right to left.| 如果您指定`LeftToRight`，包含文字之子控制項顯示從左到右。If you specify `LeftToRight`, child controls that include text display from left to right. 如果您指定`RightToLeft`，包含文字之子控制項顯示由右至左。If you specify `RightToLeft`, child controls that include text display right to left. 使用`RightToLeft`来顯示之語言所撰寫由右至左，例如阿拉伯文或希伯來文文字。Use `RightToLeft` to display text for languages that are written from right to left, such as Arabic or Hebrew. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性就只支援瀏覽器支援 HTML 4.0 或更新版本。This property is supported only on browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. A控制項中填入列舉值。A control is populated with the enumeration values. 使用者從清單方塊中選取的值為基礎的面板變更的標籤和選項按鈕的顯示方向。The display direction of the label and radio buttons in the panel change, based on the value the user selects from the list box. 請注意，此範例會使用英文文字。Note that this example uses English text. 因此，當`RightToLeft`值為 selected、 對齊文字的右邊維護控制項，但是由左到右的順序的英文文字。Therefore, when the `RightToLeft` value is selected, the text is justified on the right side of the control, but the left-to-right order of the English text is maintained. 在真實世界應用程式中您會設定屬性設`RightToLeft`如果您已顯示左到右的語言的文字。In a real-world application you would not set the property to `RightToLeft` if you were displaying text for a left-to-right language. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-vb[Panel.Direction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Direction/VB/panel.directionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定面板控制項中包含之控制項群組的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the caption for the group of controls that is contained in the panel control.

value.span: 面板控制項中包含之子控制項的標題文字。

span.span: The caption text for the child controls contained in the panel control.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來顯示框架和標題中包含的控制項群組控制項。Use the property to display a frame and caption for the group of controls that is contained in the control. 的值使用 FIELDSET 與圖例項目，HTML 4.0 規格中引進來呈現控制項。The value of a control is rendered using the FIELDSET and LEGEND elements, which were introduced in the HTML 4.0 specification. 如果用戶端瀏覽器使用 HTML 3.2值則不會呈現。If the client browser uses HTML 3.2, the value is not rendered. 用戶端瀏覽器文件中的欄位集和圖例項目顯示方式的詳細資訊，請參閱。Refer to your client browser documentation for details on how the FIELDSET and LEGEND elements are displayed. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the contents within the panel.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定項目的對齊方式。Use this property to specify the alignment of the elements in the . ## Examples 下列範例說明如何靠右或靠左對齊的控制項內。The following example illustrates how to right-align or left-align the controls within the . > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Panel.HorizontalAlign Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Renders the HTML closing tag of the control into the specified writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is used primarily by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.ScrollBars ScrollBars { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ScrollBars ScrollBars
Public Overridable Property ScrollBars As ScrollBars
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ScrollBars ScrollBars { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ScrollBars get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ScrollBars value); };
member this.ScrollBars : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ScrollBars with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在 控制項中捲軸的可視性和位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the visibility and position of scroll bars in a control.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的可視性和位置的捲軸在控制項。Use the property to specify the visibility and position of scroll bars in a control. 此屬性設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|不顯示捲軸。No scroll bars are shown.| |`Horizontal`|只有水平捲軸會顯示。Only a horizontal scroll bar is shown.| |`Vertical`|只有垂直捲軸會顯示。Only a vertical scroll bar is shown.| |`Both`|同時顯示水平和垂直捲軸。Both horizontal and vertical scroll bars are shown.| |`Auto`|如有必要，水平、 垂直或這兩個捲軸會顯示。If necessary, horizontal, vertical, or both scroll bars are shown. 否則不顯示捲軸。Otherwise, no scroll bars are shown.| 如果您指定`Auto`for屬性，捲軸會自動顯示當中內容的大小控制項的大小超過控制項本身。If you specify `Auto` for the property, scroll bars are automatically shown when the size of the content in a control exceeds the size of the control itself. 例如，如果控制項包含一個資料表，以及面板不寬度不足以顯示資料表中的所有資料列，顯示垂直捲軸。For example, if a control contains a table, and the panel is not wide enough to display all the rows in the table, a vertical scroll bar is shown. 如果資料表的大小超過面板的寬度與高度，則會顯示這兩個垂直和水平捲軸。If the size of the table exceeds the height and width of the panel, both vertical and horizontal scroll bars are shown. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性就只支援瀏覽器支援 HTML 4.0 或更新版本。This property is supported only on browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性設`Auto`。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property to `Auto`. [面板] 中包含的資料表，其中的整個內容超過面板的大小。The panel contains a table, the entire contents of which exceed the size of the panel. 這會導致這兩個垂直和水平捲軸 面板轉譯時，自動顯示。This causes both vertical and horizontal scroll bars to be automatically displayed when the panel is rendered. 然後，使用者可以捲動檢視資料表中的所有資料。The user can then scroll to view all the data in the table. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Panel.Scrollbars#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars/CS/panel.scrollbarscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Panel.Scrollbars#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars/VB/panel.scrollbarsvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. A控制項中填入列舉值。A control is populated with the enumeration values. 捲軸顯示在面板的變更，根據使用者從清單方塊中選取的值。The scroll bars displayed in the panel change, based on the value the user selects from the list box. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Panel.Scrollbars2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars2/CS/panel.scrollbars2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Panel.Scrollbars2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Panel.Scrollbars2/VB/panel.scrollbars2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性會指出 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0; 否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指示如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要包裝的內容中使用這個屬性。Use this property to wrap the contents of the . ## Examples 下列範例說明如何以程式設計方式設定屬性控制項。The following example illustrates how to programmatically set the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
